A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Entertaining\, daring and fun. I genuinely enjoyed this movie and thought that it was perfect. While they took some characters in directions that were unexpected or may have felt underwhelming you need to realize that there are more than the films and a characters origins may be explained in comics\, novels or shows like the clone wars and rebels series. I am a huge fan of Adam Drivers Kylo Ren and his raw aggression.
